participant_2.background:
I love to feel the warm sun on my skin and the salty sea air in my hair.
My family is full of witty people and we love cats.
I've finally settled down in the country with my dog and started a new job.
I try to start my mornings with a fresh cup of coffee and a healthy breakfast.
i just graduated college with my bachelor s degree in education.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi, how's it going?
It's going great! I'm just working on a few lessons and enjoying the sunshine.
That sounds nice! I'm trying to get ready for work. I just graduated college and got a job as a teacher!
Congratulations! That's awesome! What grade will you be teaching?
I'll be teaching second grade. I'm really excited!
I bet! I'm sure you'll be great.
Thanks! I'm trying to be.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to the beach and read. I also love to spend time with my family.
That sounds really nice.
What about you? What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the park and work on my laptop. I also like to listen to music and play video games.
That sounds like fun! I love to listen to music too.
What are your favorite bands?
I like a lot of different bands, but my favorite is probably The Avett Brothers.
I've never heard of them. What kind of music do they play?
They're a folk rock band. They're really good.
I'll have to check them out.
You should! I think you'd like them.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
